paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Window function */

SELECT 
    alias, rescues, t.name, 
    avg(rescues) OVER(PARTITION BY t.name) as team_avg
FROM 
	demo.supers s INNER JOIN
	demo.supersteams st ON s.id = st.supersid INNER JOIN
	demo.teams t ON t.id = st.teamsid 
ORDER BY
	t.name, rescues DESC

Superman	257	Justice League	197.0000

Robin/Nightwing	127	Justice League	197.0000
Robin/Nightwing	127	Teen Titans	93.0000
Gar Logan	59	Teen Titans	93.0000

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Window function */

SELECT 
    alias,
    rescues,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY t.name ORDER BY rescues DESC) AS rank,
    t.name,
    avg(rescues) OVER(PARTITION BY t.name) as team_avg
FROM 
	demo.supers s INNER JOIN
	demo.supersteams st ON s.id = st.supersid INNER JOIN
	demo.teams t ON t.id = st.teamsid 
ORDER BY
	t.name, rescues DESC

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Recursive Common Table Expression */

WITH RECURSIVE heroes AS(
	SELECT id, alias, name, mentor
	FROM demo.supers
	WHERE name = 'Dick Grayson' 
    UNION
    SELECT s.id, s.name, s.alias, s.mentor
    FROM demo.supers AS s, heroes AS h
    WHERE s.id = h.mentor 
)
SELECT * FROM heroes ORDER BY mentor;
